languages.text: At the beginning of the Master Tactician's turn, if their {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} is higher than 125, the first {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack or {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} used by the Master Tactician this turn costs −1 less {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action point{/g} (minimum 0).
languages.original_text: Если в начале своего хода у мастера-тактика больше 125 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментума{/g}, то его первая атака {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}очередью{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}атака по области{/g} в этом ходу требует на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} меньше (минимум 0).

traits.locale_text: At the beginning of the Master Tactician's turn, if their {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} is higher than 125, the first {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack or {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} used by the Master Tactician this turn costs −1 less {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action point{/g} (minimum 0).
If at the beginning of the Tactician's turn their Momentum is higher than 125, the first Burst Fire or Area of Effect attack used by the Tactician this turn costs 1 less Action Point (minimum 0).
At the beginning of the Tactician's turn, if their momentum is higher than 125, the first burst fire or area of effect attack used by the Tactician this turn costs 1 less action point (minimum 0).

languages.text: Если в начале своего хода у мастера-тактика больше 125 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментума{/g}, то его первая атака {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}очередью{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}атака по области{/g} в этом ходу требует на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} меньше (минимум 0).
languages.original_text: At the beginning of the Master Tactician's turn, if their {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} is higher than 125, the first {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} fire or {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} used by the Master Tactician this turn costs −1 less {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action point{/g} (minimum 0).

traits.locale_text: Если в начале своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} у тактика больше 125 моментума, то его первая атака очередью или атака по области в этом ходу требует на 1 ОД меньше (минимум 0).
Если в начале своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} у тактика больше 125 моментума, то его первая атака очередью или атака по области в этом ходу требует на 1 ОД меньше (минимум 0).

languages.text: 战术专家的回合开始时，如果战术专家的{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}高于125，则本回合首次{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}连发{/g}攻击或{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}消耗的{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}会降低1点（最低降至0点）。
languages.original_text: At the beginning of the Master Tactician's turn, if their {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} is higher than 125, the first {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack or {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} used by the Master Tactician this turn costs −1 less {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action point{/g} (minimum 0).

traits.locale_text: 战术专家的回合开始时，如果战术专家的{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}高于125，则本回合首次{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}连发{/g}攻击或{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}消耗的{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}会降低1点（最低降至0点）。

languages.text: Al comienzo del turno del maestro táctico, si su {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}ímpetu{/g} es superior a 125, el primer ataque de {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}ráfaga{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataque de área{/g} que realice el maestro táctico este turno cuesta −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}punto de acción{/g} menos (hasta un mínimo de 0).
languages.original_text: At the beginning of the Master Tactician's turn, if their {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} is higher than 125, the first {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack or {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} used by the Master Tactician this turn costs −1 less {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action point{/g} (minimum 0).

traits.locale_text: Al comienzo del turno del maestro táctico, si su {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}ímpetu{/g} es superior a 125, el primer ataque de {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}ráfaga{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataque de área{/g} que realice el maestro táctico este turno cuesta −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}punto de acción{/g} menos (hasta un mínimo de 0).

languages.text: Ist zu Beginn des Zugs des Meistertaktikers seine {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Dynamik{/g} höher als 125, kostet sein erster {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}Salvenangriff{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriff{/g} in diesem Zug −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}Aktionspunkt{/g} weniger (minimal 0).
languages.original_text: At the beginning of the Master Tactician's turn, if their {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} is higher than 125, the first {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack or {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} used by the Master Tactician this turn costs −1 less {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action point{/g} (minimum 0).

traits.locale_text: Fällt zu Beginn des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Meistertaktikers{/g} seine {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Dynamik{/g} höher als 125 aus, kostet sein erstes {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}Salvenfeuer{/g} oder sein erster {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriff{/g} in diesem Zug 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}Aktionspunkt{/g} weniger (minimal 0).

languages.text: Au début du tour du maître tacticien, si sa {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}fougue{/g} est supérieure à 125, la première attaque en {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}rafale{/g} ou la première {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaque de zone{/g} qu'il utilise au cours de ce tour coûte −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}point d'action{/g} (minimum 0).
languages.original_text: At the beginning of the Master Tactician's turn, if their {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} is higher than 125, the first {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack or {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} used by the Master Tactician this turn costs −1 less {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action point{/g} (minimum 0).

traits.locale_text: Au début du tour du maître tacticien, si sa {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Fougue{/g} est supérieure à 125, la première attaque en {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}rafale{/g} ou la première {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaque de zone{/g} qu'il utilise au cours de ce tour coûte −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}point d'action{/g} (minimum 0).

languages.text: 戦略の達人のターンの開始時、その{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}推進力{/g}が125より高い場合、このターンに戦略の達人が初めて使用する{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}バースト{/g}攻撃または{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}の消費{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}アクションポイント{/g}が−1減少する（最小0）
